bar
----
application/datalog
input.char{char: "b", id: 0}.
input.char{char: "a", id: 1}.
input.char{char: "r", id: 2}.
input.next{left: 0, right: 1}.
input.next{left: 1, right: 2}.
input.char{char: "START", id: -1}.
input.char{char: "END", id: -2}.
input.next{left: -1, right: 0}.
input.next{left: 2, right: -2}.
